title: Before I Won
description: Tom Seed lives a difficult life. Born in one of the wealthiest cities in America – he grows up in one of the poorest boroughs in New York – in Bronx. No friends, no love, no games, no happiness.An old black box with a shining screen provided everything that his parents could not.All the anger, all the hatred inside Tom found a way out.By destroying the wealth of the rich, he seeks revenge for a cursed life lived in dirty poverty.It should have brought relief and light into his life. Instead it brought even more pain and darkness.Depression, family break-up, life on the streets and attempting suicide.Before I Won is a story. A story of battles with your own self. A story about finding yourself.
author: Tomas Veres
